nodes.text: @CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden @ewarren truthful based on the info gathered from the meeting.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden @ewarren But definitely @ewarren has good plan on eliminating racial wealth disparities in the US.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden Also, there was an emphasis on not only debt cancellation but thinking bout how to increase resources in general to communities of color.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden Modeling showed cancelling all debt would actually increase racial wealth gap.\n\nBut this needs to be juxtaposed that government spending does not only include education.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden And some recommend paying off undergraduate debt at least which the average is around $30,000.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems @JoeBiden Doctors and lawyers debt is over $100,000 easily but they make good money when they finish so it is easier to pay it off.

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems But, they recommended $75,000 cancellation and other mechanisms to reduce racial wealth gap.\n\n@JoeBiden

@CRLONLINE @RepPressley @FenabaAddo @tmshapiro @DarrickHamilton @ACHesquire @HilaryOShelton @Bakari_Sellers Again, the scholars are not calling for complete cancellation of debt, just a large proportion of debt which is feasible.\n\n@SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer @HouseDemocrats @SenateDems
